item.title: Help with castle wars code
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

buddy863:

its in the void that gives the player a reward once the game is over, try just searching castlewars

…there are a billion results if you’ve added castle wars when you search castle wars, can you be just a little more specific.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 12:04:14 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Nintendo_G”][quote author=buddy863 link=topic=136411.msg1314448#msg1314448 date=1179097324]
its in the void that gives the player a reward once the game is over, try just searching castlewars
[/quote]
…there are a billion results if you’ve added castle wars when you search castle wars, can you be just a little more specific.[/quote]
So do you know where it goes more specifically?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 12:09:59 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Nintendo_G”][quote author=buddy863 link=topic=136411.msg1314448#msg1314448 date=1179097324]
its in the void that gives the player a reward once the game is over, try just searching castlewars
[/quote]
…there are a billion results if you’ve added castle wars when you search castle wars, can you be just a little more specific.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 12:04:14 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Nintendo_G link=topic=136411.msg1314469#msg1314469 date=1179097454]

its in the void that gives the player a reward once the game is over, try just searching castlewars

…there are a billion results if you’ve added castle wars when you search castle wars, can you be just a little more specific.
[/quote]
So do you know where it goes more specifically?[/quote]
…wow I was gone all day and still nobody knows…I can’t beleive people don’t know how to get their own code to work …

item.title: Help with castle wars code
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

Here’s the code so in castle wars when you die you go back to your base instead of where you would usualy go if you died but I can’t figure out where to add the top part. The only void I have for castle wars is the public void for castle wars score… If anybody can tell me more specifically where I should put the top code that would be great. and here’s the code directly quoted form the person who gave it to me, ignore the bottem part.

[quote=".Kaboom"] if ((miHP <= 1) && (playerissara >= 1)) { miHP += 100; teleportToX = 2426; teleportToY = 3074; else if ((miHP <= 1) && (playeriszammy >= 1)) { miHP += 100; teleportToX = 2370; teleportToY = 3131;

Add it WITH the void you made for castlewars

And change the playerisara and playeriszammy to W/e you named them

Also replace your boolean apply dead with this

[code] public boolean ApplyDead() {
if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
actionAmount++;
actionTimer = 0;
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
pEmote = 2820;
IsDeadTimer = true;
ApplyDead();
}
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
keepItem1();
keepItem2();
keepItem3();
deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
youdied();
PKz();
teleportToX = 3222;
teleportToY = 3218;
heightLevel = 0;
startcw = 0;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
if(keepItem != 0)
addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
if(keepItem2 != 0)
addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
if(keepItem3 != 0)
addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                    resetKeepItem();
                    
	}
	return true;[/code]

You may want to edit it a bit.

ALL THIS WORKS WITH I LOOTS I castlewars with NO editing[/quote]

Read full topic
